statements: SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_subject = 'Math' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_subject FROM Students WHERE student_grade BETWEEN 70 AND 80;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_grade < 70 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_subject = 'Science' ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_grade DESC, student_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80 AND student_subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, student_grade, student_subject FROM Students WHERE student_grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_subject = 'Science' OR student_subject = 'History' ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_grade) AS distinct_grades FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommended_topic = 'Mathematics'
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade = 90 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, recommended_topic FROM recommendations WHERE recommended_topic LIKE '%Python%' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN recommendations ON students.student_id = recommendations.student_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade < 70 ORDER BY student_grade DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade_value >= 90;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade < 60 ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id WHERE grade_value >= 90 ORDER BY grade_value DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' AND course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE student_performance > 80;
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM Courses JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Recommendations ON Students.student_id = Recommendations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Recommendations.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level='10th grade';
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, recommended_grade_level FROM Students JOIN Recommendations ON Students.student_id = Recommendations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Recommendations.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.grade_level='9th grade';
SELECT teacher_name, course_name FROM Teachers JOIN Courses ON Teachers.teacher_id = Courses.teacher_id WHERE Courses.course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, Teachers.name FROM Courses JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM Assignments;

SELECT Students.name AS student_name, Teachers.name AS teacher_name FROM Recommendations JOIN Students ON Recommendations.student_id = Students.student_id JOIN Teachers ON Recommendations.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, performance_score FROM Students WHERE performance_score >= 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS num_assignments FROM Courses JOIN Assignments ON Courses.course_id = Assignments.course_id GROUP BY course_name, teacher_id;

SELECT Teachers.name AS teacher_name, Courses.course_name, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM Teachers JOIN Courses ON Teachers.teacher_id = Courses.teacher_id JOIN Assignments ON Courses.course_id = Assignments.course_id GROUP BY teacher_name, course_name;
SELECT Students.name AS student_name, Recommendations.recommendation_text FROM Students JOIN Recommendations ON Students.student_id = Recommendations.student_id WHERE Students.grade_level = 12;
